title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Koch Industries' data migration success with AWS Countdown Premium (SPS316)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Koch Industries 借助 AWS Countdown Premium 实现数据迁移成功 (SPS316)
abstract: See how Koch Industries used AWS Countdown Premium to successfully modernize their legacy data systems. We'll demonstrate how moving to cloud-native technologies improved performance, reduced costs, and enhanced data security. This session shows practical steps for updating older data systems to support AI/ML initiatives and innovation.
abstract_cn: 了解Koch Industries如何使用AWS Countdown Premium成功实现其传统数据系统的现代化。我们将演示如何通过迁移到云原生技术来提高性能、降低成本并增强数据安全性。本次会议展示了更新旧数据系统以支持AI/ML计划和创新的实用步骤。
